item.description:
Many of you know Therese, one of our most "sympa" members. Join us to celebrate her new novel, Loom, and attend the book launch!

We'll meet at Tabella Restaurant in Amherst at 7:15 for drinks and French conversation. Then, we'll walk over to Amherst Books for an 8 pm book launch including a reading and book signing.

Please note, the novel is in English. Here is a link to the event at Amherst Books: http://www.amherstboo...

Remember, if you can't make the drinks part, you can still join us for the reading and to support Therese on this special evening.
item.name: Therese Chehade's Book Launch / Pre-event drinks at Tabella
